LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_MGR_Katana.label: Duelist Objectifier
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_MGR_Katana.description: A highly experimental and unstable High-Frequency Blade that excels against armored targes, able to bypass even the toughest of plating after a short charge up time.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_MGR_Katana.tools.point.label: point
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_MGR_Katana.tools.edge.label: edge
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_MGR_Katana_Jump.label: Duelist Objectifier (RUSH)
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_MGR_Katana_Jump.description:
A highly experimental and unstable High-Frequency Blade that excels against armored targes, able to bypass even the toughest of plating after a short charge up time.
This variant comes with a jump ability and counts as a ranged weapon.
LanguageData.MGR_Katana_Sheath.label: Quick-Draw Sheath
LanguageData.MGR_Katana_Sheath.description: Lined with a Synthread and Hyperweave mixture, This specialized sheath is designed to contain the unstable power of the D.O. Able to fire out the blade within at high speed for an ultra-clean cut.
LanguageData.Projectile_BaseAbility.label: my ability projectile
